question: Justice D Sreedevi who passed away was the former judge of this state high court.
explanation: Justice D Sreedevi, former judge of the Kerala high court, died while she was undergoing treatment for some ailment in Kaloor, Kerala. Justice D Sreedevi was 79 years old. She was a social activist. She was born in 1939 at Chirayinkeezhu in Thiruvananthapuram. From 1997 to 2001 she was high court judge in Kerala. She was appointed the chairperson of the Kerala Women's Commission in 2001 and 2007. She had penned down an autobiography named 'Aa Niyogathaal'.
